title: Add tests for playing back binlogs of each file format
body:
Make a canonical .proj similar to 
https://github.com/KirillOsenkov/MSBuildStructuredLog/blob/main/src/Tests/1.proj

Build MSBuild for each binlog version increment, and record versionX.binlog from the same project. Gather an array of 14 binlogs and add a test that plays each of them back.
